introduction: SYNOPSISCommercial photographer Kim Hyun-jun's wife Jung In-ha reacts to her husband's indifference with an affair with a young man Hwang Chang-wu. Feeling guilty, she confesses her affair to her husband and demands a divorce. When Hyun-jun regrets and comes back to her, he finds her with Chang-wu whom she is not supposed to be seeing anymore and gets disappointed. When Chang-wu is murdered, the husband once again reaches for the wife suggesting that they become family again but In-ha declines his offer not being able to forgive herself.故事抗丈夫的冷漠，他的妻子荣格的商业摄影师gimhyeonjun划分青年和所谓的秘密恋情黄某Changwoo。切到底能得到丈夫的注意，需要承认，彻底告别以往任何时候都否认她丈夫的内疚和自我厌恶。当最后参观了亲贤妻子又后悔了错误令人惊讶的是，谁与他的妻子一起破晓黄某Changwoo见证。玄落在极度沮丧明知拖带电缆误解。由过去的罪过，谁黄某Changwoo当它被许诺了新的生活谋杀案联系在一起，丈夫原谅削减提议回家，再次返回到相同的。但是，裁员不能原谅自己，整理丈夫的非法曼达左侧。
